Parameters:

#define RTP_REPAIR_INVALID_SRC_INDEX   -1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Lookup a rtp source in the local cache of dataplane sources.

Parameters:
[in] p_sess Pointer to the repair session.
[in] lookup Attributes of the source to be looked up.
[out] int32_t Returns the index of the source if a match is found, -1 otherwise. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
#define RTP_REPAIR_IS_DEL_RECURSIVE (  ) 

Value:

({                                          \
            s_rtp_repair_del_lock;                  \
        })

 
#define RTP_REPAIR_LOCK_RECURSIVE_DEL (  ) 

Value:

({                                          \
        s_rtp_repair_del_lock = TRUE;           \
    })

 
#define RTP_REPAIR_UNLOCK_RECURSIVE_DEL (  ) 

Value:

({                                          \
        s_rtp_repair_del_lock = FALSE;           \
    })

rtp_repair_recv_t* rtp_create_session_repair_recv ( vqec_dp_streamid_t  dp_id,
in_addr_t  src_addr,
char *  cname,
in_addr_t  fbt_ip_addr,
uint16_t *  recv_rtcp_port,
uint16_t  send_rtcp_port,
uint32_t  local_ssrc,
rtcp_bw_cfg_t *  rtcp_bw_cfg,
rtcp_xr_cfg_t *  rtcp_xr_cfg,
in_addr_t  orig_source_addr,
uint16_t  orig_source_port,
uint32_t  sock_buf_depth,
uint8_t  rtcp_dscp_value,
uint8_t  rtcp_rsize,
vqec_chan_t *  parent_chan 
)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Create the session structure for an repair-recv RTP/RTCP session.

Parameters:
[in] dp_id - Dataplane session identifier.
[in] src_addr - Sessions src address to use for transmitting packets.
[in] cname - SDES cname for this session.
[in] fbt_ip_addr - IP address of feedback target.
[in] recv_rtcp_port - RTCP port number of recv sock repair session. If the port number is 0, an ephemeral port will be allocated.
[in] send_rtcp_port - Remote rtcp port number of repair session (may be 0, which means don't do RTCP)
[in] local_ssrc - SSRC of the local source
[in] rtcp_bw_cfg - Ptr to RTCP bandwidth config info
[in] rtcp_xr_cfg - Ptr to RTCP XR config info
[in] orig_source_addr - Original channel source address.
[in] orig_source_port - Original channel source port.
[in] sock_buf_depth - Socket input buffer depth in bytes.
[in] rtcp_dscp_value - DSCP class for RTCP packets.
[in] rtcp_rsize - Boolean flag for setting Reduced Size RTCP
[in] parent_chan - Parent channel ptr.
Returns:
Pointer to a repair session. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void rtp_delete_session_repair_recv ( rtp_repair_recv_t **  pp_repair_recv_sess,
boolean  deallocate 
)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Frees a session. The session will be cleaned first using rtp_cleanup_session.

Parameters:
[in] pp_sess ptr ptr to session object
[in] deallocate boolen to check if the object should be destroyed ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

rtp_source_id_t *  p_source_id 
) [static]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Add a new source member to a rtp session.

Parameters:
[in] p_session Pointer to the repair rtp session.
[in] p_source_id Pointer to the source member attributes.
[out] boolean Returns true if the addition of the source member succeeded, false otherwise. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

static boolean rtp_repair_check_src_table ( rtp_repair_recv_t *  p_sess,
vqec_dp_rtp_src_table_t *  table 
) [static]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Verify that all entries in the source table: -- pass the SSRC filter check if one is installed. -- no two sources with the same SSRC, can have the same <IP source, port> tuple. [such a sender will cause rtp to throw a duplicate member error. [The dataplane inputshim has a source filter for the repair session IP address, port thus the condition cannot happen under normal operation and is considered an error case].

Parameters:
[in] p_sess Pointer to the repair session.
[in] table Dataplane source table.
[out] boolean Returns true, if all entries are verified, false if there is an error condition. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

static boolean rtp_repair_compare_src_table ( rtp_repair_recv_t *  p_sess,
vqec_dp_rtp_src_table_t *  table 
) [static]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Compare a dataplane source table against the local source cache. It is assumed that there are no duplicates.

CAUTION: O(N^2) loop for search. Fortunately, N will be 3 or 4 so no issues will arise.

Parameters:
[in] p_sess Pointer to the repair session.
[in] table Dataplane source table.
[out] boolean Returns true, if there are no mismatches, false otherwise. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

static void rtp_repair_del_stale_sources ( rtp_repair_recv_t *  p_session,
vqec_dp_rtp_src_table_t *  table 
) [static]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Helper to remove all stale source entries from the control-plane.

Parameters:
[in] p_session Pointer to the repair session.
[in] table Pointer to the source table. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

boolean  destroy_flag

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Cleanup a session's state prior to entering error state.

Parameters:
[in] p_session Pointer to the repair session. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

static boolean rtp_repair_find_add_new_sources ( rtp_repair_recv_t *  p_session,
vqec_dp_rtp_src_table_t *  table 
) [static]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Find and add new sources in the repair table to the repair session.

CAUTION: O(N^2) loop for search. Fortunately, N will be 3 or 4 so no issues will arise.

ASSUMPTION: The combined dataplane RTP receiver source-pool is less than or equal to the control-plane pool.

Parameters:
[in] p_session Pointer to the repair rtp session.
[in] table Pointer to the dataplane source table.
[out] boolean Returns true if the addition of all the new source members succeeded, false otherwise. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

rtp_source_id_t *  lookup 
) [static]

rtp_source_id_t *  id 
) [static]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------- The primary packet flow source has changed - install a new SSRC filter. The sources for the session are updated after the new SSRC filter is installed.

Parameters:
[in] session Pointer to the repair session.
[in] id Attributes of the new source. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Function: rtp_repair_recv_init_module Description: One time (class level) initialization of various function tables

Parameters:
[in] max_sessions The maximum number of repair sessions to be created MUST BE AT LEAST 1.
[out] boolean TRUE(1) if successfully initialized this module else returns FALSE(0).

[in] remote_port UDP port to which the packet is sent.

[in] len Length of the contents.
[out] boolean Returns true if the packet was successfully enQd in the socket. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
